text: phir, jab haraam (pratishthit) maheene beet jaen to musharikon ko jahaan kaheen pao qatl karo, unhen pakado aur unhen ghero aur har ghaat kee jagah unakee taak mein baitho. phir yadi ve tauba kar len aur namaaz qaayam karen aur zakaat den to unaka maarg chhod do, nishchay hee allaah bada kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
